verses.1: Tua ciangin Teman khuami Elifaz in thu hong gen a,
verses.2: “Mi khatpeuh in thu hong genpih leh na heh ding hiam? Kua in a kam ip zo nawn ding ahi hiam?
verses.3: Lunghiang mite na hanthotna, khut kha ban kha mite na thakhauhsakna,
verses.4: a puk mite na thugenna tawh na kipsakna, khuk zaw mite na hatsak ngeite ngaihsun in.
verses.5: Ahi zongin nang tungah tuate hong tung a, na thuak zo kei hi. Tuate in nang hong su a, na lungniam hi.
verses.6: Na biakna in hong hehnem zo lo ahi hiam? A paubaang lo, na nuntakna in lametna hong pia zo lo ahi hiam?
verses.7: Tu-in ngaihsun in: Midik kimlai kua sia ngei ahi hiam? A thutang mi a kisuksiatna koi ah mu ngei na hi hiam?
verses.8: Mawhna bawlin buaina a piangsak mi in a gamtatna bangin a gah a atna ka thei hi.
verses.9: Pasianʼ husanna tawh tua bang mite sia a, ama hehna in tua bang mite kaang tum hi.
verses.10: Humpinelkai hawk bangin migiloteʼ hawkna dai ta a, Pasian in amauteʼ ha suktansak khin ahih manin gamdai ta uh hi.
verses.11: Annek ding a mu lo a thahat humpinelkai bangin amaute si mangkhin uh a, a tate uh kithehthang hi.
verses.12: “Tu-in kei kiangah thu khat hong tung khian a, ka bil in tua thu ginghiau a za hi.
verses.13: Mi a ihsip hun zankim laitak, zan mangmat hun laitakin
verses.14: launa le linna kei tungah hong tung a, ka pumpi linna in kei hong lausak hi.
verses.15: Huih in ka mai hong mut a, ka khuasikmul hong suaksak hi.
verses.16: A mel ka khen theih loh lim khat hong dinga, keima mai ah mihing lim khat hong om a, tua ciangin aw un duadua khat ka za a,
verses.17: ‘Pasianʼ mai ah mi khatpeuh paubaang loin om zo ngei ding ahi hiam? Amah a Bawlpaʼ mai ah sitbaang loin om zo ngei ding ahi hiam?
verses.18: Pasian in ama nasemte mahmah muang zo loin, ama sawltakteʼ mawhna mu ahihleh,
verses.19: inn umna kawmin buan a kizatna inn sunga a teeng mite, a inn bulpi leivui ahi,
verses.20: zing kal nitak kalin, a kisusia thei sungah a omte, bangzah ta-in kuama don lohin si pakin,
verses.21: amauʼ liatna in taisan pak dinga, pilna ngah ngei loin si pak zaw ding hi lo ahi hiam?’ hong ci hi.
